markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[War Conditioning](/Feats.aspx?ID=5586) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=757" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 15 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You have extensive training in remote environments, allowing you to move through these areas easily. When you gain this feat, you can choose to gain either a climb Speed of 20 feet or a swim Speed of 20 feet.
name: War Conditioning
